metadata.title: Friday, 13th November, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    what the total value of the following Government assets was as of 31st August, 2015:
(i)    real estate; (ii)    motor vehicles; and (iii)    fixtures and fittings; and
(b)    what the annual depreciation rate of the assets above was, as of the same date.
(a)    when the construction of the security fence at the Katima Mulilo Border Post will be completed;
(b)    what the total cost of the project is;
(c)    how much money had been spent on the project as of September, 2015; and
(d)    who is financing the project. QUESTION FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W12    Mr Mbewe (Chadiza) - to ask the Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry:
(a)    how many manufacturing companies were operational as of December, 2011, country-wide;
(b)    of the companies above, how many were still operational as of December, 2014; and
(c)    what the total number of employees working in the manufacturing sector was, from 2011 to 2014, year by year.
